details.purpose: To record details about an action taken as part of a follow up.

items.items: An action taken as part of a follow up
Follow up still required but requires intervention
The follow up has been rescheduled
A follow up visit has occurred
No further follow up until intervention
Follow up has not begun and is no longer required
Patient has been contacted regarding follow-up
Follow up was commenced by has been ceased
Follow up process has been completed
An appointment has been resceduled during active follow up
